roleset.name: engrave
roleset.note: INSCRIBE-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from inscribe.01-v)
INSCRIPTION-N NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to inscribe.01. Inscribe.01 is a member of VN class image_impression-25.1. Framed by Katie (from inscription.01-n)

example.name: passive, with surface and message
example.text: [The front of the monument in the garden]-21 was inscribed [*-21]with the 12 largewords " Martyrs who [*T*-22] died in the Southern Anhui Incident will be immortal forever " , written [*] personally by comrade Xiaoping Deng .
example.arg: with the 12 large words " Martyrs who [*T*-22] died inthe Southern Anhui Incident will be immortal forever " , written [*]personally by comrade XiaopingDeng

roleset.name: enrollment
roleset.note: INSCRIPTION-N NOTES: Added by Julia. (from inscription.02-n)

example.name: args1,2
example.text: And this possibility is achieved only by his inscription into another tradition.
